name: Angelic Montmorancy
description: A hardworking nun doing her best to help weak and poor souls
story: Even after being formally appointed a nun, Montmorancy keeps making mistakes. However, instead of blaming herself and asking others for help, she perseveres in her efforts to help others.

relations.description: Montmorancy believes that she can help Clarissa just as Clarissa helped her in the past.
To Montmorancy, Achates is an incredible person for how hard she works every day.
Montmorancy realized that even though she is high-ranking, she is always looking after everyone.

specialty.name: Heartfelt Care
specialty.description: Her gentle touch will drive pain away.

skills.name: Earnest Prayer
skills.description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.
skills.soul_description: Effect is granted to all allies.
skills.enhanced_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Effect Resistance.
Increases Effect Resistance by 3%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 8%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 15%.
When using Purification, has a chance to grant continuous healing to all allies for 1 turn.
When using Purification, has a 2% chance to grant continuous healing to all allies for 1 turn.
When using Purification, has a 5% chance to grant continuous healing to all allies for 1 turn.
When using Purification, has a 10% chance to grant continuous healing to all allies for 1 turn.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 2%.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 10%.
Increases Sleep Sorcery's sleep effect chance.
Increases Sleep Sorcery's sleep effect chance by 3%.
Increases Sleep Sorcery's sleep effect chance by 8%.
Increases Sleep Sorcery's sleep effect chance by 15%.
Increases Effect Resistance.
Increases Effect Resistance by 7%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 15%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 25%.
When using Purification, has a chance to dispel one additional debuff.
When using Purification, has a 5% chance to dispel one additional debuff.
When using Purification, has a 13% chance to dispel one additional debuff.
When using Purification, has a 25% chance to dispel one additional debuff.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 1%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 5%.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness after using Purification when the caster's Effect Resistance is 100% or more.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 2% after using Purification when the caster's Effect Resistance is 100% or more.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 5% after using Purification when the caster's Effect Resistance is 100% or more.
Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 10% after using Purification when the caster's Effect Resistance is 100% or more.
Has a chance to reset cooldown of Purification if the caster is not debuffed at the beginning of the turn.
Has a 10% chance to reset cooldown of Purification if the caster is not debuffed at the beginning of the turn.
Has a 25% chance to reset cooldown of Purification if the caster is not debuffed at the beginning of the turn.
Has a 50% chance to reset cooldown of Purification if the caster is not debuffed at the beginning of the turn.
When using Purification, has a chance to heal all allies additionally, regardless of debuffs.
When using Purification, has a 20% chance to heal all allies additionally, regardless of debuffs.
When using Purification, has a 50% chance to heal all allies additionally, regardless of debuffs.
When using Purification, has a 100% chance to heal all allies additionally, regardless of debuffs.

buffs.name: Immune
buffs.effect: Unaffected by debuffs and some harmful effects.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.
